sentences.en: a rubbish heap
sentences.cn: 垃圾堆

sentences.en: Clothes were thrown in the luggage in an untidy heap.
sentences.cn: 衣服被乱糟糟地扔进旅行箱里。

sentences.en: Formerly [ In the past ] the place was a heap of ruins.
sentences.cn: 当初 这里是一片废墟.

sentences.en: He has dug up the tiles that cover the floor and left them in a heap.
sentences.cn: 他把地上铺的瓷砖掀了起来，堆成一堆。

sentences.en: he landed in a heap at the bottom of the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他瘫倒在楼梯底下。

sentences.en: He put the cardboard boxes in a heap and stamped them down.
sentences.cn: 他把纸板箱堆成一堆,将它们踩扁.

sentences.en: Lee and I fell in a tangled heap.
sentences.cn: 李和我扭作一团，摔倒在地。

sentences.en: Mrs. Madrigal heaped more carrots onto Michael's plate.
sentences.cn: 马德里加尔太太往迈克尔的盘子里放了更多的胡萝卜。

sentences.en: Put them in a heap.
sentences.cn: 把它们堆在一起.

sentences.en: She piled the papers in a heap on her desk, just anyhow.
sentences.cn: 她把文件在桌上随便搁成一堆。

sentences.en: She turned her face away from him, burrowing into her heap of covers.
sentences.cn: 她侧过脸背向他，钻进她那堆被子里。

sentences.en: The building was reduced to a heap of rubble.
sentences.cn: 大楼变成了一片残垣断壁。

sentences.en: The children have heaps of energy.
sentences.cn: 孩子们精力充沛。

sentences.en: The gardener began to heap up the fallen leaves.
sentences.cn: 园丁开始把落叶堆起来.

sentences.en: The tower collapsed in a heap of ruin.
sentences.cn: 这座塔倒塌了,成为一堆废墟.

sentences.en: There was a big heap of stones in the road.
sentences.cn: 路上有一大堆石头.

sentences.en: They had jumbled it all up into a heap.
sentences.cn: 他们把所有的东西胡乱堆成了一堆。

sentences.en: We piled the branches into heaps for burning.
sentences.cn: 我们把树枝堆起来烧。

sentences.en: Who will heap the stones?
sentences.cn: 谁愿意把这些石头堆起来?

sentences.en: With the closure of the factory, thousands of workers have been thrown on the scrap heap.
sentences.cn: 工厂倒闭, 几千名工人被遗弃.

phrases.phrase: at the top (或 bottom) of the heap
phrases.tran_cn: （人）在社会（或组织）最高（底）层的

phrases.phrase: be struck all of a heap
heap coals of fire on someone's head

trans.tran_en: to put a lot of things on top of each other in an untidy way
